mods.abstract: DETAINED in the jail of the parish of St. John the Baptist, the runaway boy calling himself HENRY, and saying to belong to Mr Glavor, of Jackson city (Mississippi). The said boy of about 30 years, meaures 5 feet 8 inches. The owner thereof is hereby requested to claim said boy, according to law. Parish of St John the Baptist, June 28th 1855. NUMA TREPAGNIER. Deputy Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
